title.narrative: Local Government Finance and Fiscal Decentralization Reform Program - Subprogram 1

description.narrative: The proposed Program aims to improve service delivery in the Philippines by assisting the development of efficient and transparent local governments within an adequate and equitable fiscal framework.

participating-org.narrative: Department of Interior and Local Government

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Efficient and transparent local governments with an adequate and equitable fiscal framework.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
By 2015, improve LGU PFMAT average score by 10% (2013 baseline currently under preparation)

description.narrative: Efficient and transparent local governments with an adequate and equitable fiscal framework.

title.narrative: By 2017, the disparities in LGU financing (measured by the coefficient of variation on per capita expenditure) decrease by 5%. (2010 baseline: 1.23 for provinces)

description.narrative: Efficient and transparent local governments with an adequate and equitable fiscal framework.

title.narrative: By 2015, increase real property tax collection by 20% (2010 baseline: P29.6 billion)

description.narrative: Efficient and transparent local governments with an adequate and equitable fiscal framework.
